REWORK

Basecamp CEO Jason Fried is back in the studio with an update on the company's Chicago headquarters. Basecamp will be leaving its office this summer after a 10-year run, and Jason is looking at a number of optionsâ€”including a space that will bring him full circle with one of his original 37signals partners.
